api.entity

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • api.entity.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlatformerEntity, TopDownEntity, Wall

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.lang.String activeSprite
      The name of the current Sprite or Animation this Entity is displaying outside of animation mode
      static java.lang.Object[] PRESET_SPRITE_ARRAY
      An array that will hold information for constructing preset sprite.Sprites available to all Entities
      protected java.lang.Object[] spritesArray
      An array that will prestore the Sprite information in the form: name, filepath

      • collides

        public Vector collides(Entity other)
        Collision detection function. Returns the vector in the direction of the force applied by the other colliding entity on this one. If the entities don't collide, returns null
        Parameters:
        other - the entity colliding with
        Returns:
        the collision result (see above for details)
